author: Kaleaves "KSP"

review: This product is amazing! I was able to keep me and my family entertained, without television, with the Chromecast.  It has worked pretty well for me, with only minor issues of being disconnected at times.  The updates are necessary and presently, I don't have any issues with its use.  I've used it for parties and at other's homes with no issues.  Netflix, Google products, HBO GO and Showtime work great.  I recommend this to everyone! It evens can cast your cell phone screen and videos onto the television.  You really can't go wrong when purchasing this product.
author: Eric Ontiveros

review: I'm not super thrilled with this. It locks up regularly which requires me to reach behind the TV to restart it. It's wireless antenna isn't great either. I can use an iPad, Nexus 7, and phone literally inches from this thing and stream Netflix and Youtube, but the Chromecast struggles to maintain a stream.
